name: Imaginarium Theater
desc:
The Imaginarium Theater is a permanent domain with challenges constantly updated on the 1st of each month. It is unlocked at Adventure Rank 35.

Before the beginning of all stories, after the end of all tales, in the interstice between reality and fantasy, there is an endless drama unfolding, never ceasing upon the stage – There is no beginning, nor an end, for in the telling of the "story," the two differ not.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>May 24, 2024</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Hello, Traveler! Version 4.7 will introduce a brand-new permanent combat gameplay called "Imaginarium Theater."</color>
<color=#ffffff73>This gameplay will offer Primogem rewards and combat buffs that are not limited to this gameplay alone.</color>

<color=#ffd780>July 01, 2024</color>
Hello, Traveler! The new permanent combat gameplay Imaginarium Theater is now available. In the gameplay details released previously, we introduced the basic rules, rewards, and schedule.

All sorts of events can happen during an Imaginarium Theater challenge.
Of these;
<color=#ffe14b>Companion Events</color> allow Alternate Cast members to join your Principal Cast.
<color=#ffe14b>Wondrous Boons</color> can grant your party combat buffs.
<color=#ffe14b>Mystery Caches</color> can grant certain benefits, but also carry a certain amount of risks.
Initially there will be 2 chances to refresh events.

After selecting Companion, Wondrous Boon, or Mystery Cache Events, Events other than Combat Events will be refreshed.
When a <color=#ffe14b>Combat Event</color> is selected, you will go on stage and start the current performance. After completing a Combat Event, you can choose between 2 characters to join the Principal Cast.
Characters who haven’t yet participated in the gamemode have a chance to provide External Audience Support for Companion Events and Wondrous Succor, bringing you additional benefits.

customize.name: Fantasia Flowers
customize.desc:
Paper flowers with a peculiar appearance, they are souvenirs earned by putting in passionate performances in the "fantasia."

Can be used to select Wondrous Boons and Mystery Caches in the Imaginarium Theater.

customize.text:
is used to unlock Companion and Wondrous Boon Events.
Players will start with <color=#ffffff>160</color> Fantasia Flowers when challenging Hard Mode and <color=#ffffff>100</color> Fantasia Flowers otherwise. They can be gained from completing Acts and Bonus Challenges.
Additionally for each extra character added to the Alternate Cast, players will gain <color=#ffffff>30</color> / <color=#ffffff>60</color> / <color=#ffffff>90</color> / <color=#ffffff>120</color> Fantasia Flowers.

Performance Details show current progression, including the completed Acts, Rewards, Opponent Details, Character Details including remaining Vigor and standby characters and the obtained Wondrous Boons or Mystery Caches.
To end the challenge, choose “End Performance”.
Completing Act 3 will reward players with 2 chances to Rewind the current performance. Using Rewind, players can restart the performance again after making necessary changes to Events and Characters.
After completing certain numbers of Acts and the challenges are finalized, you may obtain rewards.
In addition, you may also earn

customize.name: Toy Medal
customize.desc:
A shiny medal. It is a toy, yes, but it nonetheless represents the acknowledgment of the audience.

Use it in the "Imaginarium Theater" to obtain "Thespian Tricks" from Wolfy.

customize.name: Wolfy
customize.desc: A concierge of the Imaginarium Theater.

customize.text:
for Thespian Tricks for certain characters, increasing the number of poses available for characters when taking photos.
New Thespian Tricks will be added and updated as the Theater updates.
<color=#ffffff>Debut Performance Reward:</color> Rewards can be obtained when the stage is cleared for the first time.
<color=#ffffff>Performance Tour Reward:</color> Rewards can be obtained every time the Theater updates.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Hero's Wit
customize.desc:
Character EXP material. Gives 20000 EXP.
These experiences are extremely precious for a pilgrim traveling through Teyvat in order to be closer to Celestia.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Teachings of Contention
customize.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.

Contention is the principle by which all is weighed in the Nation of Pyro.

What defines strength, and what weakness? Only victory and defeat. The results of a contest are more convincing than any words.

customize.name: Guide to Contention
customize.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.

Contention is the principle by which all is weighed in the Nation of Pyro.

Though humans cannot fly at the speed of winged beasts, nor match the flexibility of slimes, yet still, they have their own unique strengths. Sometimes, understanding both why and how to compete is the key to knowing oneself.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Hero's Wit
customize.desc:
Character EXP material. Gives 20000 EXP.
These experiences are extremely precious for a pilgrim traveling through Teyvat in order to be closer to Celestia.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Teachings of Kindling
customize.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Offering up kindling is the established rule of the Nation of Pyro.
For something gained, something must be given. If you wish to obtain something, you must first pay the corresponding price, just like the offerings that should be made as kindling in the process of incineration.

customize.name: Guide to Kindling
customize.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Offering up kindling is the established rule of the Nation of Pyro.
To acquire a certain amount of something, one must first pay the corresponding price. Sometimes, you may end up paying too much to obtain something; while other times, you may pay too little, and lose it as a result. Understanding how to strike this balance between giving and receiving is one of the meanings of offering kindling.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Hero's Wit
customize.desc:
Character EXP material. Gives 20000 EXP.
These experiences are extremely precious for a pilgrim traveling through Teyvat in order to be closer to Celestia.

customize.name: Fragile Resin
customize.desc:
An item used to restore Original Resin by 60 points.

This crystalline substance pulsates with a little energy that can be absorbed by Original Resin. The flow of energies of all sorts is the source of many wonders and challenges in the world. Those same energies are also contained within this crystal.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Toy Medal
customize.desc:
A shiny medal. It is a toy, yes, but it nonetheless represents the acknowledgment of the audience.

Use it in the "Imaginarium Theater" to obtain "Thespian Tricks" from Wolfy.

customize.name: Sanctifying Essence
customize.desc:
Artifact EXP material. Gives 10,000 EXP.
Artifacts are themselves the physical manifestation of ideals and memories. Materials such as this, which contain the distilled essence of the power thereof, can make these memories and ideals clearer and stronger still.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Teachings of Conflict
customize.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Conflict is considered reason in the Nation of Pyro.
Rather than avoiding conflict, one should face confrontations head-on. Once the outcome has been made manifest, the path forward should be determined accordingly.

customize.name: Guide to Conflict
customize.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Conflict is considered reason in the Nation of Pyro.
Conflicts can always be resolved by greater powers. This fact means that they can always be managed, as opposed to developing into something uncontrollable. Conflict is also a kind of limitation, preventing people from endless shirking of responsibilities without weighing the costs. It demands that participants settle their scores decisively and efficiently.

customize.name: Midlander Billet Trove
customize.desc:
A precious strongbox that contains a billet filled with potential. It is capable of changing its shape to fit the wishes of its owner.

Use this item to choose one of the following items:

  • ・Midlander Sword Billet

  • ・Midlander Bow Billet

  • ・Midlander Claymore Billet

  • ・Midlander Catalyst Billet

  • ・Midlander Polearm Billet

customize.name: Crown of Insight
customize.desc:
A precious Talent Level-Up material.
Once a medium for the storage and transfer of wisdom in ancient times. Now, wisdom is found in ancient texts and in profound speech. Nevertheless, this Crown of Insight must still be able to impart some transcendent power and wisdom to its bearer.

customize.desc:
Artifact EXP material. Gives 2,500 EXP.
Material that contains the distilled essence of great power. It can contribute to the enhancement of artifacts.

customize.name: Sanctifying Essence

Artifact EXP material. Gives 10,000 EXP.
Artifacts are themselves the physical manifestation of ideals and memories. Materials such as this, which contain the distilled essence of the power thereof, can make these memories and ideals clearer and stronger still.

customize.text:
After finalizing a Star Challenge, you can earn a <color=#ffe14b>Stella</color> corresponding to the Act.
Depending on which Act was completed, you will earn different levels of <color=#ffe14b>Performance Medals</color> , which will be displayed in your profile.

<color=#ffffff73>There are achievements specially related with your progress in the Imaginarium Theater and with some internal challenges.</color>
<color=#ffd780>Imaginarium Theater: The First Folio</color>

<color=#ffffff>Opening Night</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Complete Act 3 / 6 / 8 in the Imaginarium Theater on any difficulty.</color>

customize.text:
This is the ceaseless drama of adventure played out in the interstice between reality and fantasy.
Complete the challenges (that is, performances) within to obtain rare treasures.
The challenges and restrictions of the Imaginarium Theater will change each season.
The first day of every month, the Imaginarium Theater will automatically reset, and the challenges and Elemental restrictions will also undergo corresponding changes.

After unlocking the Imaginarium Theater, the Fantastical Blessings available will refresh each season, offering buffs for the Opening Characters.
These buffs will be effective both during Imaginarium Theater challenges and in your adventures outside the theater.
The requirements to perform varies depending on the difficulty level.

<color=#ffffff>Easy Mode</color>
Complete <color=#ffffff>3</color> combat performances to end the show
<color=#ffffff73>Minimum characters required: 8</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Maximum characters: 10</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Character level requirement: Level 60</color>
<color=#ffffff>Normal</color>
Complete <color=#ffffff>6</color> combat performances to end the show
<color=#ffffff73>Minimum characters required: 12</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Maximum characters: 14</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Character level requirement: Level 60</color>
<color=#ffffff>Hard Mode</color>
Complete <color=#ffffff>8</color> combat performances to end the show
<color=#ffffff73>Minimum characters required: 16</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Maximum characters: 20</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Character level requirement: Level 70</color>
<color=#ffacff>Visionary Mode</color>
Complete <color=#ffffff>10</color> combat performances to end the show
<color=#ffffff73>Minimum characters required: 22</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Maximum characters: 26</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Character level requirement: Level 70</color>
<color=#ffffff73>For each extra character added past the minimum character requirement for each difficulty, additional buffs will be given.</color>

<color=#ffffff>1 Extra Character</color>
Gain <color=#ffffff>30</color> Fantasia Flowers
Gain <color=#ffffff>2</color> Blessing Level(s): Max HP increased by <color=#ffffff>1600</color> , ATK by <color=#ffffff>100</color> , DEF by <color=#ffffff>100</color> , and Elemental Mastery by <color=#ffffff>40</color> .
<color=#ffffff>2 Extra Characters</color>
Gain <color=#ffffff>60</color> Fantasia Flowers
Gain <color=#ffffff>4</color> Blessing Level(s): Max HP increased by <color=#ffffff>3200</color> , ATK by <color=#ffffff>200</color> , DEF by <color=#ffffff>200</color> , and Elemental Mastery by <color=#ffffff>80</color> .
<color=#ffffff>3 Extra Characters</color>
Limited to Hard Mode and <color=#ffacff>Visionary Mode</color>
Gain <color=#ffffff>90</color> Fantasia Flowers
Gain <color=#ffffff>6</color> Blessing Level(s): Max HP increased by <color=#ffffff>4800</color> , ATK by <color=#ffffff>300</color> , DEF by <color=#ffffff>300</color> , and Elemental Mastery by <color=#ffffff>120</color> .
<color=#ffffff>4 Extra Characters</color>
Limited to Hard Mode and <color=#ffacff>Visionary Mode</color>
Gain <color=#ffffff>160</color> Fantasia Flowers
Gain <color=#ffffff>8</color> Blessing Level(s): Max HP increased by <color=#ffffff>6400</color> , ATK by <color=#ffffff>400</color> , DEF by <color=#ffffff>400</color> , and Elemental Mastery by <color=#ffffff>160</color> .

<color=#ffffff>Principal Cast:</color> A pool of characters that can be used directly when gameplay challenges begin, and can be directly added to your team for combat.
<color=#ffffff>Alternate Cast:</color> A pool of characters that cannot be directly used. Travelers must complete <color=#ffe14b>Combat Events</color> , trigger <color=#ffe14b>Companion Events</color> , or use other methods in order for Alternate Cast Members to join the Principal Cast.

<color=#ffffff>Opening characters:</color> 6 characters designated at the start of each season. These 6 characters will be set as your initial Principal Cast. The Imaginarium Theater will offer trial versions of all 6 characters.
<color=#ffffff>Required Elemental Types:</color> Only characters that meet the Elemental requirements for that season may participate.
<color=#ffffff>Supporting Cast:</color> Characters chosen by your friends to offer as support characters, other than your own characters.
<color=#ffffff>Special Guest Stars:</color> A special pool of selectable characters that do not need to meet the Elemental requirements for that season.
It is recommended to allocate time for these character to <color=#ffe14b>fight on the field</color> as much as possible to utilize their strong suits.
These characters can provide considerable assistance <color=#ffe14b>while off-field</color> . Distribute time between them and the on-field characters to better complete performance challenges.
This character archetype <color=#ffe14b>deals markedly greater damage</color> to opponents within any set amount of time. It is recommended to give them sufficient time in combat.

These characters have remarkable <color=#ffe14b>support capabilities</color> , allowing other characters to fight more effectively. Distribute them across teams to tackle and complete harder challenges.
When facing stronger or more numerous opponents, these characters are more effective in <color=#ffe14b>dealing with incoming attacks</color> while the player finds a way to turn things around.

Supporting Cast characters can assist friends in their performances, and up to <color=#ffffff>7</color> characters can be set. Characters that meet the Elemental Type requirements for that season or Special Guest Stars can be invited by friends.
Supporting Cast characters can assist Friends up to <color=#ffffff>15</color> times during each Imaginarium Theater season.

Characters start out with 2 Vigor, and after completing a <color=#ffe14b>Combat Event</color> , characters will lose 1 Vigor.
Once all Vigor is exhausted, the character cannot participate in combat.

value.name: Unbegun, Unending Story
value.desc: The sacrifice demanded by magic is consolation...

value.name: Envisaged Echoes
value.desc: Envisaged Echoes is a high difficulty permanent challenge gameplay constantly updated each season and rewards character's Echo cosmetic. It is unlocked after completing Act 6 of Imaginarium Theater at Adventure Rank 35.
